node.display_name: G2 Axle & Gear YJ RockJock Rear Axle Assemblies
node.long_desc: YJ RockJock Rear Axle Assembly;G2 RockJock axle assemblies are built for the hardcore wheelers and rock crawlers;AR400 heat-treated skid plate;3 Inch D.O.M. steel tubes;Available for the Jeep front axle and the Jeep rear axle;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If you are looking for the toughest axle assembly for your Jeep, G2 and Currie Enterprises have come together to offer you these custom built to order RockJock assemblies. These axles feature Curries famous high pinion Ductile iron center section with its rotated cover design and replaceable skid plate for the ultimate in protection. The internals feature top shelf lockers and gears with Timken bearings and National seals. These assemblies feature bullet proof 1 1/2inch 35 spline Chromoly axle shafts for the ultimate in strength and durability.

node.sales_desc: The aFe filter restore kit comes with a aerosol bottle of aFe gold filter oil and a spray bottle of aFe filter cleaner. aFe filter oil is highly refined and helps capture the smallest debris. Recommended re-oiling every 20-30k miles. Please do not over oil the filter, please use instruction sheets below.

node.display_name: aFe Power TOP Racer PRO 5R Air Filters
node.long_desc: Air Filter; Black/Blue;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: aFe's high performance, high flow air filter replaces the restrictive factory paper filters and lets your engine breathe better. Paper filters do a good job in keeping dirt out but can clogged easily so that they need to be replaced frequently. Foam filters also clog easily. A washable/reusable, cotton gauze filter like ours allows more airflow and is washable and reusable.

node.display_name: G2 Axle & Gear JK Core 44 Rear Axle Assemblies
node.long_desc: JK Core 44 Rear Axle Assembly;G2 axle assemblies are made to withstand hard off-road use;Stronger and more durable than factory Jeep axles;All G2 axle brackets and weak points are gusseted and reinforced;Comes fully assemblied with your choice of gear ratio and locker;Available for the Jeep front axle and the Jeep rear axle;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
G2 Axle & Gear is proud to introduce the new Core 44 axle housing for 2007 and up Jeep JK Wranglers. Utilizing the strongest and latest generation high pinion Dana 44 gear design, we have developed a whole new housing to handle the heavy loads that would normally bend a stock Dana 30 or Rubicon Dana 44.

The Core 44 will accept stock Dana 44 ring and pinions, axle shafts, and all aftermarket lockers. The Core 44 features a unique Adjuster Nut System to easily set backlash and carrier pre-load. The Core 44 includes heavy duty forged inner C ends, and 3 inch x .250 inch wall tubing to resist bending in even the most extreme conditions. All Core 44 brackets are laser cut and CNC formed from 3/8 inch steel for added strength, and are designed to allow bolt-in installation.

American-made Core 44 housings accept the latest generation Dana 44 gear design, with a larger diameter ring gear and bigger pinion shaft to withstand hard off-road use. Our housings feature forged bearing caps and a unique G-lock adjuster nut system to set backlash and carrier bearing preload. Core 44 axles use additional ribbing on the cast center section and 3-inch diameter, 5/16-wall DOM axle tubes with forged inner Cs for use with tall, aggressive tires.

The Core 44 is a direct replacement for the Dana 30 under the front of your leaf sprung 87-95 YJ Wrangler or coil sprung 97-06 TJ Wrangler. All brackets are designed around stock mounting points, and are laser cut and CNC formed from 3/8-inch steel for added strength. We have also gusseted and reinforced any weak points to prevent damage to the brackets and finish the housing in a UV-stable black.

node.long_desc: TJ RockJock Rear Axle Assembly;G2 RockJock axle assemblies are built for the hardcore wheelers and rock crawlers;AR400 heat-treated skid plate;3 Inch D.O.M. steel tubes;Available for the Jeep front axle and the Jeep rear axle;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: G2 Axle & Gear XJ RockJock Rear Axle Assemblies
node.long_desc: XJ RockJock Rear Axle Assembly;G2 RockJock axle assemblies are built for the hardcore wheelers and rock crawlers;AR400 heat-treated skid plate;3 Inch D.O.M. steel tubes;Available for the Jeep front axle and the Jeep rear axle;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: For the ultimate in durability and strength, G2 offers new High Pinion 60 axle assemblies featuring Currie RockJock housings. These bulletproof axle assemblies are designed with the hardcore wheeler/rock crawler in mind. Built to order packages include the complete housing featuring the new RockJock III ductile iron center (highest ground clearance 60 on the market), AR400 heat-treated skid plate allowing the axle to slide over rocks easily, 3 DOM steel tubes, 1350 pinion yoke, (1310/1330 optional), and all new heavy duty Currie Jeep suspension brackets. These housings are hand assembled by expert drivetrain specialists using high quality G2 axle shafts, G2 Premium ring and pinion gears, Timken bearings and the locker of your choice."

node.sales_desc: This linear light bar is the legendary flagship E-Series light bar treated to a gentle arc, creating a curve in a 20-54" extruded aluminum housing and packed full of Rigid Industries Spot LED technology to produce an astonishing custom look for any car, truck or offroad vehicle. The RDS-Series is the apex of form and function. Rigid Industries RDS-Series is another first for the LED lighting industry and has been in testing and pre-production for the last two years and was first tested by BJ Baldwin as seen on his trophy truck at Parker 425 in February 2012. Since that time, Rigid Industries' engineering team has been through numerous design changes, incorporating multiple patent pending utility and design features. The RDS LED light bar transforms the rectangular light bar Rigid Industries created, which became a phenomenon in 2006, to give this futuristic design sleekness and offer its customers an increased light spread. The world is curved, match it."

node.long_desc: FX1 Pro Racing Front Seat;Integrated full body support;5 point harness capability;Requires additional mounting brackets for your application;Single seat;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The FX1 Pro racing seat features composite fiberglass technology. The FX1 Pro racing seat comes in three different sizes, the FX1 Pro, FX1, and FX1 Wide. The FX1 Pro combines comfort, performance, and safety at an absolutely unbeatable price. Designed with an emphasis on comfort, this seat is one of the most comfortable race seats you will ever sit in. If you enjoy racing and want a practical and affordable shell seat, the FX1 Pro is a hard one to pass on. As a rule of thumb, the FX1 Pro racing seat will fit up to a 36 inch waist, the FX1 will fit up to a 38 inch waist and the FX1 Wide (black only) will fit up to a 42 inch waist. High wear patches are strategically placed to protect your seat from abuse in the high wear areas. The FX1 Pro racing seat is available in cloth fabric with leatherette high wear patches. Bolster Support: Ultimate lateral support with well-defined thigh, kidney, and shoulder bolsters will allow both the driver and passenger to remain in the optimal seating position. The reduction of body shifting will reduce the amount of driver fatigue and enhance the overall driving experience. Seat Back Brace: This seat is equipped with a bolt on the back giving it the ability to be bolted to a seat back brace Harness Capability: This seat has harness slots for 3, 4 and 5-point harness capability. A submarine slot is already installed for a 5th strap. Fabric: Anti-slip cloth materials, coupled with anti-wear patches. Contains UV inhibitors. This seat has been extensively tested under extreme conditions and found to be colorfast. Aluminum Side Mounts: This seat can be bottom mounted or side mounted. Aluminum side mounts are available which allow the seat to be bolted right to the floor. Fiberglass Shell: Fiberglass composite shell with a black gel coat.

node.sales_desc: Perfect for securing and transporting a handgun between the home, office and in a vehicle. The lockable welded steel storage box can be used to protect valuables both while carrying it by hand between locations and also inside a vehicle. The included mounting sleeve is securely bolted to the vehicle or any sturdy mounting surface. The security box slides into the mounting sleeve and can be locked in place. The security box can additionally be removed from the sleeve and can remain locked closed during hand transport. The system mounts anywhere there is available space and extra sleeves are available to allow the box to be secured in a sleeve mounted in the vehicle and also in the home or office. The inside is lined with carpet to protect the contents. Optional pick-n-pluck foam is available for additional custom sized protection around the valuables. Features Tuffy's Pry-Guard locking system with a 10 tumbler double bitted key and grade 8 mounting hardware. Optional pushbutton combo lock is available for quick keyless access to contents (shown in some images).

The Rugged Ridge Quick Release Mirror Relocation Kit is the perfect solution for your Wrangler. How quick can you remove or install the stylish quick release mirrors? In a word, quick. The mirrors mount to a bolt-on bracket and are secured with a locking knob that allows for easy installation and removal. node.long_desc: A4 Racing Seats;Perfect for tight space and minimal headroom applications;High Density injection molded foam;Fits up to a 36 inch waist;Will require additional mounting brackets for your application;Sold as a Pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The A4 is the perfect adjustable racing seat for tight spaces and minimal headroom applications. Whether on the street, the track, or off-road, the A4 racing seat will enhance your overall driving experience. As a rule of thumb, the A4 will fit up to a 34-36 inch waist while the A4 Wide will fit up to a 38-40 inch waist. High wear patches are strategically placed to protect your seat from abuse in the high wear areas. The A4 racing seat is available in cloth, with leatherette high wear patches, microsuede, with leather high wear patches, and 100% black leather. Infinite recline: The fingertip controlled reclining mechanism allows the seat back to be adjusted to the ultimate driving position. Corbeau reclining technology allows with just the lift of the lever, the seat back to be immediately returned to the full upright position. Bolster Support: Ultimate lateral support with well-defined thigh, kidney, and shoulder bolsters will allow both the driver and passenger to remain in the optimal seating position. The reduction of body shifting will reduce the amount of driver fatigue and enhance the overall driving experience. Harness Capability: This seat has harness slots for 3 and 4-point harness belt capability. A submarine slot (5th slot) can be added to the seat base for a $29.00 charge. This slot will create 5-point harness capability. Injection Molded Foam: High-density injection molded foam provides ultimate comfort. The heat transfer into the foam causes the seat to form to your body. The foam will maintain its shape for years insuring long lasting comfort. Fabric: Anti-slip cloth and microsuede materials coupled with anti-wear patches. Contains UV inhibitors. 100% automotive grade leather also available. This seat has been extensively tested under extreme conditions and found to be colorfast. Steel Frame: Extra strong, lightweight, powder coated tubular steel frame.

node.display_name: Vertically Driven Products KoolBreez Brief Top
node.long_desc: KoolBreez Brief Top;Full roll bar top;Black mesh;Allows cool breezes in;Protects you from the suns UV rays;California Residents: WARNING"

Baja Bench Suspension Seats;Military grade suspension cord systems;Lap belt capability;Ideal for off road applications;Powdercoated steel frame;May require additional mounting brackets for your application;Bolt-in to CJ and YJ Jeeps use bracket part number B36001;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Baja Bench suspension seat was designed for enthusiasts who want the safety of suspension and the comfort of Corbeau. We integrated our state-of-the-art suspension system with the comfort and design that Corbeau is so well know for and from that came the Baja Bench suspension seats. With our custom brackets, the Baja Bench is a direct bolt in to most CJ and YJ Jeeps (Bracket part number B36001), and early Broncos (Bracket part number C22201). We also have a universal Baja Bench Adapter bracket that with minor drilling will allow the Baja Bench seat to fit in almost any other application, as long as the floor is flat and there is sufficient space. We do not recommend this seat be used in places where a seat was not intended by the orginal manufacture of the vehicle. The Baja Bench comes standard with vertical tabs on the bottom for mounting to a roll cage. If you plan on mounting to a flat surface you will need to order the Baja Bench universal bracket. All Corbeau bench suspension seats are available with an adjustable headrest. This headrest adjusts both up and down and forward and back for ultimate comfort. The Baja Bench off-road suspension seat is available in all vinyl or vinyl/cloth materials. The Baja Bench seat is available in sizes 36, 40" and 42"."

node.long_desc: Baja JP Suspension Seats;May require additional mounting brackets for your application;Sold Individual;Slots for up to a 5 point harness;Lowered bolsters keep you in place but allow ease of entry and exit;Bolts onto factory slider/seat bracket, no adapter required for most applications;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Baja JP suspension seat is basically the same seat as our well-known Baja SS seat. The main difference between the two seats, aside from the stitch pattern and dual harness slots, is the Baja JP is flat on the bottom as opposed to vertical tabs. This allows it to bolt on Corbeau brackets or a flat mounting surface without having to order a Baja Adapter. In addition, the Baja JP is a direct bolt in to most Jeep CJ5's, and all CJ7's and YJ's. Please note, the stock CJ brackets are at an angle, which means when the JP is bolted to the stock brackets, it puts the seat at an extreme angle. We recommend our custom CJ brackets unless you are okay with the seat back being at an extreme recline. The Baja JP will fit in any other vehicle with Corbeau custom brackets. Like all Corbeau suspension seats, the Baja JP is equipped with the state of the art Corbeau suspension system. This system has proven to provide superior cushioning and significant energy return upon impact. The suspension system creates somewhat of a trampoline affect, which absorbs the impact your back would otherwise endure. The Baja JP is available in all black vinyl and vinyl/cloth materials. The Baja JP will fit up to a 38 inch waist and the Wide will fit up to a 42 inch waist. You will notice the overall width of the Baja JP Wide is actually narrower then the regular Baja JP, this is not a typo. When we say wide we mean it will fit a wider driver. The Baja JP Wide has less aggressive bolsters making it a better fit for larger drivers but is indeed an overall narrower seat.

node.display_name: California Super Trucks Shift Linkage Relocation Bracket

node.long_desc: For winches with 10,000 lb. (4535 kg) pull rating or less;Reinforced soft eyes;Ballistic nylon sliding sleeve;12 strand construction polyethylene
node.sales_desc: High Performance rope for vehicle self-recovery.Spydura synthetic winch rope is constructed of a unique Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene material and offers high abrasion resistance and tremendous tensile strength. Coated with high temperature urethane and equipped with a ballistic nylon sliding sleeve, Spydura synthetic winch rope provides extreme protection against wear and abrasion. Lightweight and reinforced soft eyes make the winching procedure quick and easy to set-up when using this rope extension on the trail.

node.long_desc: Allows for Low Range Gearing Without Engauging the Front Axle;Eliminates Drive Train Bind;Does not require any external modifications;Avaliable for NP231-J and NP241OR Transfer Cases;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The 2Low kit provides the benefit of true low range gearing, while allowing the front to freely turn. It lets you choose 2Low in addition to the other standard options. The 2Low kit will eliminate drive train bind and most of your tight trail three-point turns. This kit is completely internal and does not require any external modifications. The new shift pattern is: 2H > 4H > N > 4L > 2L

node.long_desc: Allows for 2WD Low Gear Range;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The TeraFlex 241OR 2Low for JK Wrangler Rubicon models will increase your standard low range shift pattern to include a rear 2WD low range option. This increases trail turning ability by allowing tighter turns on narrow switchbacks, and eliminates most front end steering bind associated with 4WD. The 2Low retains the use of all factory low-range options such as: ESP disabling, electronic swaybar disconnect, and locker engage & disengagement. In the 2Low position the 4WD dash light will illuminate indicating you are in a low range gear. The new shift pattern is: 2H > 4H > N > 2L > 4L

node.sales_desc: Fuel Pressure Regulator #8190 is for carburetor applications that require consistent pressure up to 9 psi. It features two 3/8 inch NPT outlets, one 3/8 inch NPT inlet and is adjustable from 4-1/2 to 9 psi. Fuel Pressure Regulator #1789 is ideal for providing consistent pressure in Edelbrock 94 or other low pressure carburetor applications. It features two 3/8 inch NPT outlets, one 3/8 inch NPT inlet and is adjustable from 1-4 psi. Includes a chrome finish for a great look when installed.

node.long_desc: For use with a 4.0L 6 cylinder engine. 4.0L engines are tuned lean from the factory, adding an adjustable fuel pressure regulator is simple to install and will gain 4hp and 7 ft pounds of torque. When used in conjunction with high-flow throttle body horsepower and torque gains can reach 7 and 10 respectively. New regulator is preset at 44 pounds (stock is approx 40) and is a direct replacement for factory regulator located on the fuel rail. Cap is machined billet aluminum. Both the high-flow throttle body and fuel pressure regulator can be used with the Mopar Fuel Injection system. 258 and 4.0L 6 cylinders bored oversize or with performance camshafts may require adjustable fuel pressure regulator to achieve adequate fuel supply. Note: Due to the hold down bracket becoming obsolete the kit will no longer contain this part. The consumer will need to increase the inside diameter of the bracket to fit over the regulator body. This can be accomplished with either a die grinder or file with minimal effort.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: For use with a 4.0L 6 cylinder engine. 4.0L engines are tuned lean from the factory, adding an adjustable fuel pressure regulator is simple to install and will gain 4hp and 7 ft pounds of torque. When used in conjunction with high-flow throttle body horsepower and torque gains can reach 7 and 10 respectively. New regulator is preset at 44 pounds (stock is approx 40) and is a direct replacement for factory regulator located on the fuel rail. Cap is machined billet aluminum. Both the high-flow throttle body and fuel pressure regulator can be used with the Mopar Fuel Injection system. 258 and 4.0L 6 cylinders bored oversize or with performance camshafts may require adjustable fuel pressure regulator to achieve adequate fuel supply. Note: Due to the hold down bracket becoming obsolete the kit will no longer contain this part. The consumer will need to increase the inside diameter of the bracket to fit over the regulator body. This can be accomplished with either a die grinder or file with minimal effort.

node.sales_desc: Edelbrock Cylinder Heads are a great way to make large gains in power to your gasoline engine. These performance cylinder heads offer increases in power and durability compared to rebuild heads as well as decreased weight.

node.display_name: Edelbrock E-CNC 215 LS Series Cylinder Head
node.long_desc: E-CNC 215 LS Series Cylinder Head; Chamber Size 65cc; Complete Single; GM LS Series Engines;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Designed for 1997 & later GEN 3 & 4 LS1/LS2 Chevy engines including 4.8L, 5.3L, 5.7L & 6.0L. All E-CNC Cylinder Heads feature fully CNC'd intake ports, combustion chambers and exhaust ports for improved air-flow. Dyno tests proved these heads are capable of 457 hp & 438 ft-lbs. of torque. High-quality conical beehive springs are secured with steel retainers and valve locks for performance up to .600 inch valve lift. Match with any one of Edelbrock's LS series intake manifolds and camshafts for a dyno-proven performance combination. Rocker bolt kit #8597 includes 8 rocker bolts that are shorter than stock to prevent the bolts from protruding into the intake ports. E-CNC 215 head is 50-state street legal.

node.display_name: Edelbrock E-Force Stage 1 Street Systems Supercharger Kits
node.long_desc: Emissions legal;Provides the best combination for your daily driver;Includes a tune for both 91 and 93 octane, on select applications;Incl. All Brackets/Hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These systems are emissions legal and provide the best combination for your daily driver. They will also include a tune for both 91 and 93 octane, on select applications. The supplied tune is intended for completely STOCK vehicles with the exception of a catback exhaust.

node.long_desc: Small Block Chevy; Base w/o Throttle Bodies; Harness And Injectors; 3y/36k powertrain warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These E-Force Supercharger systems for small-block Chevy are a traditional positive displacement supercharger that is ideal for use in street rod and muscle car applications. They include a newly designed intake assembly with Eaton Gen VI 2300 TVS internals, manifold, drive pulleys, 10-rib serpentine belt, and all the necessary hardware. Complete systems are pre-assembled for an easy bolt-on installation. E-Force Supercharger systems are available with or without dual-carburetors and dual EFI throttle bodies. These systems are designed to be installed on a factory style front end drive. Will not work directly with aftermarket serpentine systems. Superchargers are available in natural satin aluminum, black powder coated or polished finish for a show quality classic look. Compatible with 6-7/16 inch center-to-center air cleaners.

node.long_desc: RIPP Superchargers is the number one and best selling supercharger system on the market;Their systems are considered the easiest to install, most powerful and most reliable;RIPP has spent an enormous amount of time tuning for better drive quality;Their systems are real-world and completely daily-drivable with no surprises;Trust the company with over twenty years of experience in the aftermarket performance industry;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Initial testing has found that in stock form the 3.8L only produces as little as 133 Wheel Horse Power (WHP) on stock wheels/tires and gears and as little as 108-123whp on up rated 35 inch tires. With the addition of a RIPP Supercharger and running through stock exhaust manifolds, cats and exhaust, the 3.8l produces 240-/+ Rear Wheel HP (WHP) on stock wheels/tires and gears at 8psi. More over an impressive 240+whp and 260+lb/ft of torque on commonly used 35 inch wheels and tires. (HP levels vary depending on tire and gear combination as rotational mass comes into play, this effects both Naturally Aspirated (NA) and Forced Induction (FI) total output). Four ply silicon hose - Black. RIPP PCV valve. All hardware and clamps included. Illustrated instructions and tech tips. 1 year warranty.

node.sales_desc: Take an already high performance street car to the next level with an Edelbrock E-Force Supercharger! These supercharger systems are exclusively tailored for the 2010-14 Camaro

node.long_desc: 1-piece design without upper doors;Textured black;Smittybilt Defender Roof Rack ready - bolt on, no drilling;Rack part number S/B40404 and mount S/BAM-4;Manufactured from honey comb hand-laid fiberglass for extra strength and rigidity;DOT approved safety glass - 31% Tint;Overhead portal windows increase ambient lighting;Exclusive raised roof design provides up to 5.5 of additional headroom;Dual rear window hydraulic lift struts;Military spec mildew free carpeted headliner;Thick UV stable black gel coat;5-year warranty;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: No vehicle on the market projects the same sense of adventure as the Jeep Wrangler. And now you can make your '07+ Jeep Wrangler even more useful with Smittybilt's new Safari Hardtop. This top puts the fun in functional with up to 5-1/2 inches of additional headroom and a unique overland look. The one piece Safari Hardtop is made in the USA from hand laid fiberglass and has a textured grain finish that matches the look of your Wrangler perfectly. Overhead portal windows increase light and the mil-spec carpeted headliner reduces both ambient heat and road noise. There are optional defender rack solutions available that can bolt directly to the top without drilling or other modifications."

node.long_desc: Dimensions: 3.07 x 2.77" x 3.07";Hard anodized and powder coated cast aluminum housing;Includes a pair of LED Lights, (2) Sets of Jeep JL mounting brackets, plug and play wiring connectors and mounting hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Baja Designs Fog Pocket replacement kit allows enthusiasts to retain factory fit and finish, while taking advantage of premium aftermarket LED output. This kit features a pair of Squadron Pros, which have a combined output of 9,800 lumens. Installing the kit can't be any easier. Their durable brackets have been designed to retain the stock mounting points. The provided wire adapters plug and play right into the OEM connectors, allowing the user to retain use of the factory fog switch, with no need for splicing or soldering.

node.display_name: Baja Designs A-Pillar Light Mounting Brackets
node.long_desc: Mounts to factory location;Powder coated steel brackets;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Baja Designs Jeep JL A-Pillar mounts make it quick and easy to mount lights onto your rig. They mate up to the JL's factory mounting locations, with no trimming or modification to the vehicle required. These powder coated steel mounts are designed to hold up to whatever elements you throw at them. Mate these brackets with any of their S2 or Squadron series lights, plus wiring harness part number 613600 for a simple and effective upgrade that brings you additional visibility and safety while driving.

node.long_desc: Round or rectangular mirror head;Bolt-on installation;Features a long adjustable mirror arm;New jam nut design for speedy installation and removal;Tough satin black powder coat finish;Includes all mounting hardware;Sold as a pair or individually;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Leaving your Wrangler JL's doors at home and enjoying the delight of open-air driving is an experience like no other. But leaving your doors behind leaves you without side-view mirrors and can put you in violation of the law in most states. Rugged Ridge Trail Mirrors provide a simple bolt-on mirror solution that is not only highly-functional, but looks great AND keeps you legal. Our JL Trail Mirrors feature a long adjustable mirror arm for greater visibility and an innovative new jam nut design for speedy installation and removal. Each mirror assembly is finished with a tough satin black powder coat finish and includes all the necessary hardware for installation. Choose from a traditional rectangular mirror head or a round mirror for a more retro appearance. Rugged Ridge Trail Mirrors fit the left OR the right side of the vehicle and are available in singles and pairs. Patent Pending.

node.long_desc: Corrects the bow of the front aftermarket lift springs;Installs quickly without specialized tools;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Correct the geometry of your aftermarket performance suspension system front springs with this Rancho Coil Spring Isolator for the 2018 Jeep Wrangler JL. Many 2.5 and taller aftermarket suspension systems use the OEM coil isolator which causes the front coil springs to flex outward and rub against the suspension. This could eventually cause a catastrophic failure of your suspension. Rancho's JL Coil Spring Isolator corrects this issue, eliminating the premature wear of your suspenion system."

node.display_name: Dana Spicer Dana 50 3.73 Ratio Ring and Pinions
node.long_desc: All Dana Spicer ring gear and pinion sets are designed and tested to meet original equipment specifications;Spicer gearing is manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated to precision, so you can count on optimum set-up and mating of the gears;Dana Spicer has conducted aggressive dynamometer tests to ensure exceptional performance of all of their genuine Spicer gearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Dana Spicer ring and pinions are the same high-quality gears that originally came in your Dana axle from the factory They're available in the most popular performance and replacement ratios. The ring and pinion gears are painstakingly designed and tested just like the original, which means smooth, reliable performance. They're built to the latest high-tolerance specifications, while also featuring a premium heat treating process that improves strength and durability. Optimal tooth profiles are also employed, which keeps operation both smooth and quiet.

When you purchase genuine Spicer ring and pinion gear sets, you can be confident the ring and pinion set will meet or exceed the exact Dana standards that original equipment manufacturers have relied upon for more than a hundred years.

The ring and pinions are manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated, so you can count on properly matched sets for optimal set-up and mesh.

Remember: Non-genuine replacement parts are usually not manufactured to the same standards, which can cost you more in the long run. When you purchase gearing with the Spicer name, you can rest assured that you are getting quality product that's engineered to keep your vehicle on the road. Reduce your downtime and cost with genuine Spicer OE products.

node.long_desc: Easy to snap on and off;Polycarbonate plastic;Extra layer of protection;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: RIGID light covers are the perfect solution for style and function. Give your vehicle a unique look while also protecting your investment. These light covers are made from a durable polycarbonate plastic that offers an extra layer of protection for the lens of your LED light. These covers snap on and off, so swapping them out is simple and easy. They are also perfect for states that require covers on accessory lights.

The 6.2 inch x 4.7 inch oval billet aluminum housing utilizes a Triplex? coating process that is up to 5 times stronger than MIL-A-8625 (Military spec for anodic coatings). This process safely allows for the use of aluminum in salt water environments. All Wake Flame underwater lights function as a master, slave, or stand alone light system. The Wake Flame works with or without DMX controllers as well as with multiple lights. Limited Lifetime Warranty. The Wake Flame comes with all necessary hardware and a 3+ meter wire lead. The bolts used to mount the Wake Flame are visible on the Surface Mount version.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: T-Rex is a billet grille manufacturer dedicated to delivering a quality product. T-Rex specializes on a specific market and caters to the needs of the customer. Focused in the design department is in the fit and ease of installation which mean bolt-on billet grilles with less tools and no cutting which in turn equals more productivity. When it comes to manufacturing a quality product, it starts in the design department but it doesn't end there. T-Rex starts with solid stock of aircraft quality T-5 or T-6 billet aluminum rather than extruded aluminum as used by some competitors. Every billet grille is treated to a durable glossy powder-coat. The final stage of manufacturing includes a three-stage polishing and cleaning. The entire process takes place in their Southern California manufacturing facility.

node.display_name: Truck Master Designs Off Road Hood
node.long_desc: Allows hot air to exit hood;Keeps engine temperatures down;Cowl brings cool air into engine compartment;Complete hood;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: JK Cowl Induction Hoods with side vents Our cowl induction hood is not only stylish but fully functional. Made from a special blend of high impact polycarbonate plastic and is extremely durable. The material is formed at very high temperatures. 300 plus degrees. The hood is a clamshell design with a full internal structure. The same material is used on commercial buses and is also used on over the road commercial trucks. The hood is designed to direct in outside ambient temp air from the rear of the cowl through a sealed internal duct system and delivers the cooler air to the air box. The side vents exhaust the under hood heat that builds up toward the rear of the engine compartment. This is the most efficient location for the vents. When the vehicle is being driven the air passing by the vents and helps pull the hot air from the engine compartment by creating a vacuum. We also designed the hood to be functional and not let water or debris get into the engine compartment. Due to the nature of the material that the hood is made from paint bonds to the plastic better than metal or fiberglass.

node.sales_desc:
ICON Vehicle Dynamics is a premiere performance suspension manufacturer specializing in aftermarket suspension components for trucks, SUV's and off road suspension development. The company's business is customer-driven, technology-influenced, engineering-oriented and focuses on world-class manufacturing processes and techniques. Led by head engineer and SCORE champion driver Dylan Evans, ICON Vehicle Dynamics has the unique qualities to design and build the highest quality suspension components and test them in both real world applications as well as race conditions.

We are often asked how ICON develops such revolutionary performance suspension systems. The answer might surprise you. Our engineers actually start by determining a desired outcome of the vehicle they are working on. By studying forces and their effect on the vehicle in motion (Vehicle Dynamics) they are able to determine what improvements can be made. They determine how they can improve drivability of the vehicle, how to improve the handling characteristics and what changes can be made to improve the vehicle in real world situations. The end result of all this study is the highest quality and performing suspension products in the world. What also sets ICON products apart is our incredible commitment of time and energy dedicated to both ride development and testing. From vehicle dynamic theory to our years of experience and involvement in off road racing, rock crawling and just about anything you can do with a vehicle on or off the road. Our engineers are in control and the driving force of our entire product line and manufacturing processes. This is made possible because all of our laser cutting, metal forming, CNC machining, welding and assembly is done in house. With a reputation built on quality, performance, and service it's clear that ICON Vehicle Dynamics is the top choice for performance suspension systems and shock absorbers for the most popular trucks and SUV's on the market.

They?re 300% brighter than a 55W halogen lights, have lower amp draw and last 10 times longer. Features include durable tempered clear glass lenses, sturdy vaporized aluminum over die-cast aluminum reflectors for maximum light output, and sealed corrosion-resistant polymer outer cases for weather resistance. node.display_name: Pro Comp Suspension Uniball Upper A Arm Bushing
node.long_desc: Uniball Upper A Arm Bushing; Uniball A-Arm Repair; Uniball Cup; 1.0 in.; Cap Part: COMH-20T;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The new Pro Comp Pro Runner Control Arms deliver amazing performance and increased durability for lifted, leveled or stock trucks. The factory upper control arms have weak ball joints and stamped steel construction that is not designed to handle off road use. Pro Comp has engineered the new Pro RunnerTM Control Arms utilizing oversized stainless steel FK uniball joints. The big uniball joints provide unparalleled strength over factory ball joints. Heavy duty 1 inch chromoly tubular construction and reinforced pivot bushing mounts are used to eliminate flex and handle the added load from extreme suspension cycling. Large PTMEG pivot bushings are equipped with zerk fittings for easy maintenance and quiet operation. Each arm is finished in a durable black powder coat finish for years of lasting performance, and includes a billet machined dust cap to keep dirt and debris out of the uniball.

node.display_name: Pro Comp Xtreme All-Terrain Radial Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 31 to 37 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 20 inch diameter;Black and Outlined Black Letter Sidewall;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Xtreme A/T gives you aggressive styling, wet weather traction, incredible off-road capabilities and long life. Using the NEXT Generation Tire Technology lets Pro Comp gives you what you've been waiting for, a tire that's equally at home on the street and in the dirt. Watch Out, there's a New Monster under the bed! Pro Comp Xtreme A/T Tires come with 50,000 Mile Tread Wear Warranty.

For those who love off-roading, there's nothing like having a truck that can tackle any terrain. The sheer feeling of power you get from a high-performance off-road vehicle is unmatched by simple cars. However, you can't expect to get the best off-road performance if you don't have a good set of tires, which is where 4 Wheel Parts steps in. We've got Pro Comp Xtreme AT tires that give you superior performance and durability on tough terrain. Plus, shopping for your Pro Comp tires at 4 Wheel Parts means you're almost guaranteed to find the size you need.

Ready to Ride

When you're out off-roading and exploring, there's nothing worse than having a problem that leaves you stranded and calling somebody for help. The best way to avoid this is to make sure you take good care of your truck or Jeep, and that includes the tires. 4 Wheel Parts has lots of Pro Comp radial tires for you to choose between if you want to give your truck a tire upgrade that's going to last.

Simple Shopping

Finding good tires can be tough enough, but it can be even more difficult to find the size you need at a good price. 4 Wheel Parts makes that easy by offering a wide selection of off road tires for Jeeps no matter what you're looking for. You don't have to worry about shopping around to get quality rubber when you shop with us.

Make It Easy

The bottom line is you need good tires if you love off-ro"

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 32 to 35 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 18 inch diameter;Black and Outlined Black Letter Sidewall;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Pro Comp Radial Xterrain Tire is two tires in one. The aggressive directional tread provides superior traction compared to standard all terrain tires, yet is surprisingly quiet on the street. Its staggered directionally grooved tread pattern has full length lug sipes for superior traction that makes it superior in mud, snow, slush, loose dirt, rock and road. Its alternating open lug shoulder grip spurs aid in increased traction and self-cleaning. The Pro Comp Xterrain's extra thick side wall treatment helps resist scrapes and cuts, maximize a biting edge side wall for increased traction on rocks or in mud. Dual guard Polyester Body Plies consist of thick polyester construction combined with a blend of side wall rubber allowing for maximum puncture resistance with total flexibility when using lower air pressure.

node.long_desc: Allows bike with angled frame to be used on bike rack;Compatible with various bike frames;Extends from 22 1/2 to 31" to accommodate multiple bike sizes;Made with high-strength steel construction;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Camping on the lake shore, hunting in the Northwoods, biking down a mountain trail -- wherever you are headed this weekend and whichever toys you want to bring along for the ride, you can Bring It with CURT cargo management products. From our expanding line of bike racks to our new and improved cargo straps, we offer cargo management solutions to fit your unique lifestyle.Whether you are an avid mountain biker or a casual rider, you will want CURT along for the ride. CURT bike racks are made to fit 1 1/4 or 2" receivers and are able to carry anywhere from two to five bikes, depending on the style of bike rack. The CURT bike beam is an adjustable beam that allows you to carry various bike frame styles with CURT bike racks. The bike beam attaches to the seat post and handle bar assembly to create a cross beam on virtually any bike frame. This is especially useful when mounting a women's bike on a CURT bike rack. The CURT bike beam is constructed from steel and features a sleek black finish."

node.long_desc: Bolts onto any trailer ball tongue with a 3/4 diameter hole;Securely holds up to two bikes with a max capacity of 70 lbs.;Tilts away for convenient rear vehicle access;Rubber-coated arms will not scratch bike frames;Features a lockable arm for added security;Protected by a durable black powder coat finish;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The CURT bolt-on bike rack can be mounted on any ball mount, step bumper or fixed-tongue trailer hitch with a 3/4 hole, taking the place of a trailer ball. It comes with a tilt-away feature for easy rear vehicle access and has a lockable arm to keep bikes secure. The CURT bolt-on bike rack holds up to two bikes and comes with coated arms so as not to scratch the bike frames."

These Jeep Cargo liners are custom molded to fit the exact contours of your Jeep's cargo space;Molded from flexible, skid-resistant rubber with deep ribs to trap debris;Prevents cargo from moving around as you drive while protecting against spills, dirt, grease and grime;Remove and install in seconds for easy cleaning;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Jeep Cargo Liner is molded with a unique pattern with Jeep Logo and feature deep ribs to trap and hold water, snow and mud to protect your carpet and keep it clean. A must during inclement weather, cargo liners work great in all seasons.

node.long_desc: Custom fit and designed to specifically fit your vehicle;Rubberized non-slippery surface minimizes cargo shifting;Tough and durable patented rubberized material resistant to most chemicals;The tray like design contains more spills and mess while providing better coverage;Installs easily in seconds with no screws, bolts or fasteners;Designed and maufactured in the USA with a lifetime guarantee;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Our Cargo Liners Protect And Defend Your Trunk And Cargo Areas From Whatever You Throw At Them. These Liners Are Custom Fit With High Perimeter Edges And A Anti-slip Surface, Minimizing Slipping And Sliding As Well As Protecting Your Rig From Inevitable Spills And Mess.

Our FormFit Design process perfectly forms each liner to the detailed contours of your specific ride. How? Well, our Nerds use lasers and computers to precisely measure each individual make and model's floorboard to create the perfect fit.

Our StayPut Cleats help keep the liner from shifting around underfoot like lesser liners. Our Classic Liners durable tread plate design and rugged material lasts forever. It can stand up to abuse like no other.

When we say it's guaranteed for life" that is exactly what we mean. No hassles, no guff. If you have a problem, we'll replace it.

Designed and Manufactured in the USA."

node.long_desc: Military spec 1000 denier black Cordura fabric;Pink embroidered Poison Spyder logo;Measures 8 x 8 x 3 inches;Main compartment securely closes using a high strength zipper;Exterior mesh pocket;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Poison Spyder Trail Purse is perfect for the ladies who would like to leave their expensive, delicate, designer handbags at home and switch to something more rugged and trail-appropriate for those Jeep trips. Originally designed by Cheri for her personal use, we've made these available to the public to satisfy a growing number of inquiries she gets about hers while out on the trail.The Trail Purse is made in the USA from military spec 1000 denier black Cordura fabric..The Trail Purse measures 8 x 8 x 3 inches, but can be bulged out to accommodate larger items. The main compartment securely closes using a high strength zipper. There is also a conveniently accessible exterior mesh pocket for keeping frequently accessed items like cell phones, notebooks, etc. And of course the Trail Purse is accented with hot pink embroidered Poison Spyder logos. The Trail Purse is Made In the USA.

node.long_desc: 30 feet long by 3 inches wide*;Industrial strength nylon webbing;24,250 lbs. minimum breaking strength**;Reinforced, stitched loop protectors;Thermofixed & treated for long wear;Stretches up to 20% to absorb shock loads;Laboratory tested for strength & quality;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Poison Spyder 3in X 30ft Recovery Strap is a must-have for every 4X4's onboard recovery kit. The strap is 30 feet long* and made of 3in* military grade nylon fabric that is designed to stretch 20% when in use, which assists with multiplying momentum when towing stuck vehicles out of a sticky situation. Other, more rigid materials tend to jerk when the strap goes tight on a full-throttle pull, potentially damaging both vehicles as well as bystanders. This Recovery Strap is rated at 24,250 lbs. capacity, and the loop ends are protected with a nylon sheath. The strap is dyed black to easily identify it as Poison Spyder quality, sewn with red thread, red loop end protectors and red protective sleeves, labeled with the Poison Spyder logo. Keep one of these and a couple of our 3/4 inch Recovery Shackles in your tool kit, and you can get yourself or your buddies out of just about any sticky situation.

node.long_desc: Protect your Jeep rocker panels with Poison Spyder Rocker Knockers by cladding them in rugged, high strength 3/16 plate steel armor;Manufactured to hug the lines of your Wrangler rocker panel perfectly forming a glove-fit with virtually no loss of ground clearance;Specifically engineered for most Jeep CJ, YJ, TJ and LJ models;Bolt holes are countersunk for the included stainless steel flat head hardware, which yields a flat, unobstructed surface to slide over obstacles.;All mounting hardware is included as well as detailed installation instructions. ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Poison Spyder Rocker Knockers protect your rocker panels by cladding them in rugged, high strength 3/16 plate steel armor. Rocker Knockers are manufactured to hug the lines of your Jeep's rocker panels perfectly, forming a glove-fit with virtually no loss of valuable ground clearance. Specifically engineered for most Jeep CJ, YJ, TJ and LJ models, Rocker Knockers are CNC laser cut from high strength 3/16" plate steel, and precisiion brake-formed for a perfect fit. Bolt holes are countersunk for the included stainless steel flat head hardware, which yields a flat, unobstructed surface to slide over obstacles. All mounting hardware is included as well as detailed installation instructions."

node.long_desc: This bumper is fabricated from 3/16 inch plate steel, CNC laser-cut and precision brake-formed into a low profile, high clearance design.;The ends of the bumper extend far enough to protect the lower corner of the grille, but not far enough to hinder tire clearance or tire access to vertical obstacles.;The two D-ring shackle mounts are CNC-machined from 1 inch plate steel to provide brute strength for the most demanding recovery operations.;Accepts most major manufacturer's winches up to 15,000 lbs. capacity;Recessed light mounts are provided for retention of the factory fog lamps or aftermarket off-road lamps;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Poison Spyder Customs RockBrawler is the bumper of choice for the wheeler who wants pure hardcore function coupled with a brawny attitude. The RockBrawler is fabricated from 3/16 inch high pressure steel plate, CNC laser cut and brake-formed for a precise fit. The Stinger is made of 1.75 inch X .120 wall DOM tubing, and extends inside the bumper shell to the inner braces for added strength.

The two D-ring shackle mounts are CNC-machined from 1 inch plate steel to provide brute strength for the most demanding recovery operations. Speaking of recovery, the integrated winch mount accepts most major manufacturer's winches up to 15,000 lbs. capacity, including the innovative Warn PowerPlant with integrated air compressor. The winch fairlead plate is flawlessly integrated into the bumper design, and doubles as gusseting for the Stinger, complete with Poison Spyder's signature oval lightning holes. Recessed light mounts are provided for retention of the factory fog lamps or aftermarket off-road lamps of your choice, and protect each one in a deep well of cold hard steel.

Another characteristic of the RockBrawler is its amazing tire clearance. The bumper has faceted ends that angle inward, giving your Jeep the ultimate in clearance for large tires, even under maximized suspension movement, and during full turn scenarios. The angled sillouhette of the bumper ends allow for this tire clearance while still protecting the lower corner of the Jeep's grille. The RockBrawler's removable lower cover has an integrated skid plate for protecting the front sway bar disconnect mechanism. Jeep JK models that are not equipped with the factory sway bar disconnect can still utilize this lower skid as added protection for the front end components. The fasteners for this cover/skid, as well as all external fasteners provided with the RockBrawler, are stainless steel flat-head cap screws for a flush surface and protection from the rocks.

node.long_desc: Skyjacker suspension systems and components are engineered by real off-road enthusiasts and extensively field tested to ensure that every shock, spring, and complete lift kit it produces is Rock Ready;Designed to take you wherever you want to go!;Skyjacker will take your truck to new heights with the increased ground clearance you're after without sacrificing safety, control, or everyday drivability;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Skyjacker produces everything your rig needs to find its way through the toughest terrain. Skyjacker suspension systems and components are engineered by real off-road enthusiasts and extensively field tested to ensure that every shock, spring, and complete lift kit it produces is Rock Ready; designed to take you wherever you want to go! Whether you're giving your suspension a slight altitude adjustment or complete off-road overhaul, Skyjacker will take your truck to new heights with the increased ground clearance you're after without sacrificing safety, control, or everyday drivability

node.long_desc: Trail-Gear's weld on steering wheel disconnect uses a solid billet steel hex shaft that you weld over your existing steering shaft or steering column. Then you would bolt our billet aluminum quick disconnect unit to your steering wheel. This system allows you to quickly disconnect your steering wheel by simply pushing a button on the quick disconnect. Available in 3/4 inch O.D. shaft or 7/8 inch O.D. shaft.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: 1200 Stall Speed;Automatic Transmission;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If you are looking to put your power to the pavement, you need our F3 Torque Converter. Torque converters are responsible for transferring engine power to the transmission. Single clutch OE torque converters can slip and increase transmission fluid temps. As you add engine performance parts like intakes, manifolds, etc. the factory torque converter?s stall RPM rises thus reducing the available low RPM pulling power. This is where the F3 torque converter comes in. Installing the F3 torque converter will lower your stall speed to as low as 1,200RPM giving you the perfect range for diesel trucks up to 1,000hp. The results of using an F3 torque converter are improved 0-60mph times (by up to 1-second), increases in towing speeds, lower transmission fluid temperatures and a more satisfying driving experience.

node.long_desc: 18 inch length 2-layer aluminized steel chambered muffler;Mandrel-bent aluminized steel;OE-style bayonet hangers, band clamps and all necessary hardware for hassle-free installation;Glide guard is constructed of 3/16 inch thick steel;Powder-coat matte-black;Counter-sunk compressor / tank mounting holes;Utilizes factory attachment points and minor drilling for simple installation;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: aFe Power is proud to introduce an all new performance package with inchGlide Guard inch on-board compressor/tank mount and Scorpion aluminized Hi-Tuck inchRock Basher inch (RB) Cat-Back exhaust system. The Glide Guard comes powder-coated in a matte-black finish with counter-sunk compressor/tank mounting holes and is constructed out of 3/16 inch thick steel to withstand extreme off-road conditions. The Hi-Tuck Cat-Back exhaust system is constructed of 2-1/2 inch mandrel-bent aluminized steel tubing. The smooth curves and increased diameter of this exhaust system helps remove restriction and keeps exhaust gas flowing smoothly for increased horsepower, torque and throttle response. The exhaust incorporates a large 18 inch length 2-layer aluminized steel chambered muffler for an aggressive sound while eliminating exhaust drone. The muffler is located prior to the rear axle for increased climbing angles. Once the aFe left side exit exhaust system is installed, the skid plate on the inchGlide Guard inchmounts neatly in the former factory muffler location tucking your air compressor and tank as high as possible (air compressor and tank not included). This exhaust system is finished off with a Hi-Tuck Tip that is developed to give your Jeep extra clearance during extreme angle climbs or descents.

node.display_name: aFe Power Pro Series Differential Covers
node.long_desc: 5 Quart Lube Capacity;Constructed out of durable A380 die-cast aluminum;Reinforced ribs and wrinkle black powder-coating with machined fins;Magnetic drain and fill plug that captures loose particles for maximum rear-end protection;Large oil level sight glass with calibration plug set to the factory fluid level to eliminate overfilling;Includes a fully machined groove to accept supplied O-ring for a leak free seal;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
aFe Power's differential cover offers what a lot of other variants offer, but the difference lies in the quality and fitment of their unit. The covers feature unique diagonal ribs which are machinednot paintedoffering a distinctive look that shines through in even the muddiest of off-road conditions. Moreover, the inside of each cover features ribs which not only keep your ring & pinions concentricity, but also improve cooling. Another differentiating feature is a clear glass window which allows you to quickly check the oil level without removing a single bolt.

The covers are constructed from cast A380-T6 Aluminum and feature several finishes including raw machined silver, wrinkle-black powdercoat and wrinkle-red powdercoat. The fins come in either machined silver or black for those who prefer a more understated look.

aFe Power's diff covers also offer a host of functional features including larger, more robust 5-quart lubricant capacity, magnetic drain plugs, a leak-free O-ring seal and all required hardware.

SeatGloves cover the prime sitting area of the seat and feature a center panel constructed of 3-Dimensional fabric with a moisture-wicking surface layer. 3-dimensional spacer fabrics combine as many as three different fibers in a simultaneous knitting operation to create a fabric with moisture management on the surface, spacer fibers in the center for breathability, and stretch solid warp knit fabric in the bottom for additional durability. Dura-Flex(R) 2000 TPO is our proprietary automotive protective material, ruggedized for extra durability and flexibility. Unlike steel, it can?t rust. And, unlike lesser products, it?s 100% UV protected to prevent chalking. We make everything right here in the USA, designing to the tightest tolerances for a factory-like fit. Yet, you install Trail Armor(R) in minutes with automotive-grade 3M (TM) adhesive, no drilling needed. Like all Bushwacker products, Trail Armor(R) is backed by our Limited Lifetime Warranty. node.long_desc: Kits Typically Include/Achieve The Following:;Improved Performance At High Speed, Designed to Work With Rubicon Express Extreme Duty 4 Link, 3 Link and Radius Arm Long Arm Kits, Adjustable Ride Height,;Increased Wheel Travel, Vehicle-Specific Tuned Shocks, Shock Geometry Improves Stability;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: When you are ready to take your Jeep Wrangler JK to the next level, it is time for Rubicon Express coilover conversion kit featuring FOX shocks. This race-inspired suspension is designed to build upon Rubicon Express Extreme-Duty long arm suspension system available for two-door JK and four-door JK Unlimited Wranglers. The long arms provide a foundation of proper suspension geometry so you can add coilover shocks to achieve greater speed and ride comfort on the trial.The advantages of coilover shocks include increased wheel travel, optimized shock dampening and the ability to customize spring rates to suit your specific needs. FOXs threaded shock bodies make it easy to fine tune ride height for even more customization. Dual coil springs result in a progressive spring rate that is comfortable on the street and over small bumps on the trail while still providing stability and control over large obstacles. Remote reservoirs increase fluid capacity for cool, consistent shock damping. Rubicon Express coilover mounts are made in the USA from plate steel to maximize clearance.

node.sales_desc: The Rubicon Express Extreme-Duty Long Arm System was the first radius long arm suspension available for the Jeep Wrangler JK. This system has been engineered to work WITH your Jeep's Electronic Stability Controls and Rubicon edition electronic sway bar WITHOUT compromising safety. Featuring our world-class chromolly Radius Long Arms, the geometry has been meticulously designed to keep pinion and driveshaft angles in phase, while elimination suspension jacking and unwanted suspension squat. Our Extreme-Duty Long Arm system coupled with properly valved Rubicon Express shocks allows the JK Wrangler to transmit throttle input to the wheels over varied terrain, providing sure-footed traction and positive suspension feedback. The result is superior on road handling and unrivaled off road performance, without the need to disable factory safety features.

node.long_desc: Parker Pumper Replacement Air Filter; Clamp-On;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Helmet air system filters on off-road vehicles, such as the Parker Pumper, keep the driver and passengers from eating dust during extended rides. They rely on an air filter to keep the air pumped into the helmets clean, and AIRAID now offers washable and reusable air filters for most common helmet air systems. The AIRAID helmet air system filters are constructed of premium SYNTHAMAX filtration media. This non-oiled media provides excellent filtration and acts as an effective barrier from even fine dust and silt. The filter casings are constructed out of polyurethane, which are guaranteed not to warp or crack over time while maintaining a positive seal surface. Servicing the AIRAID helmet air system filters requires only common household cleaner and water, and with proper care these filters are designed to last for the life of the air system. The AIRAID helmet air system filters are available for most popular air system brands with a choice of different heights to accommodate different installation and service interval needs.

node.long_desc: Westin's circuitry is designed in-house to be more powerful, more efficient and to generate less heat. The durable cast aluminum housings feature over-sized heat sinks which keep the temperature at a minimum and allow our LEDs to run cooler and brighter. Westin gives the housings a high quality powder-coat and finish them off with a custom-molded rubber seal and an unbreakable, scratch resistant lens. Includes mounting hardware.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Westin HDX Series Crossover Tool Boxes
node.long_desc: Available in aluminum or textured black powder coat finish;Heavy-duty 0.06 corrosion resistant aluminium;Tool box lids sit flush with box body on all sides;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Westin HDX Tool Boxes are Commercial Grade quality tool boxes made of heavy-duty 0.06 corrosion resistant aluminum. Tool box lids sit flush with box body on all sides so there is no lid overhang. HDX Tool Boxes feature cushioned lid opening mechanics for a soft spring self-opening lid. Lid closure also features a closed cell U-Lock bulb that seals the closure. Lids can be opened from either end of the tool box with the anti-theft stainless steel folding T-handles. All three styles are available in aluminum or textured black powder coat finish. HDX Tool Boxes are proudly made in the USA.

node.display_name: Dana Spicer Dana 50 4.10 Ratio Ring and Pinions
node.long_desc: All Dana Spicer ring gear and pinion sets are designed and tested to meet original equipment specifications;Spicer gearing is manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated to precision, so you can count on optimum set-up and mating of the gears;Dana Spicer has conducted aggressive dynamometer tests to ensure exceptional performance of all of their genuine Spicer gearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Dana Spicer ring and pinions are the same high-quality gears that originally came in your Dana axle from the factory They're available in the most popular performance and replacement ratios. The ring and pinion gears are painstakingly designed and tested just like the original, which means smooth, reliable performance. They're built to the latest high-tolerance specifications, while also featuring a premium heat treating process that improves strength and durability. Optimal tooth profiles are also employed, which keeps operation both smooth and quiet.

When you purchase genuine Spicer ring and pinion gear sets, you can be confident the ring and pinion set will meet or exceed the exact Dana standards that original equipment manufacturers have relied upon for more than a hundred years.

The ring and pinions are manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated, so you can count on properly matched sets for optimal set-up and mesh.

Remember: Non-genuine replacement parts are usually not manufactured to the same standards, which can cost you more in the long run. When you purchase gearing with the Spicer name, you can rest assured that you are getting quality product that's engineered to keep your vehicle on the road. Reduce your downtime and cost with genuine Spicer OE products.

node.long_desc: All Dana Spicer ring gear and pinion sets are designed and tested to meet original equipment specifications;Spicer gearing is manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated to precision, so you can count on optimum set-up and mating of the gears;Dana Spicer has conducted aggressive dynamometer tests to ensure exceptional performance of all of their genuine Spicer gearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Dana Spicer ring and pinions are the same high-quality gears that originally came in your Dana axle from the factory They're available in the most popular performance and replacement ratios. The ring and pinion gears are painstakingly designed and tested just like the original, which means smooth, reliable performance. They're built to the latest high-tolerance specifications, while also featuring a premium heat treating process that improves strength and durability. Optimal tooth profiles are also employed, which keeps operation both smooth and quiet.

When you purchase genuine Spicer ring and pinion gear sets, you can be confident the ring and pinion set will meet or exceed the exact Dana standards that original equipment manufacturers have relied upon for more than a hundred years.

The ring and pinions are manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated, so you can count on properly matched sets for optimal set-up and mesh.

Remember: Non-genuine replacement parts are usually not manufactured to the same standards, which can cost you more in the long run. When you purchase gearing with the Spicer name, you can rest assured that you are getting quality product that's engineered to keep your vehicle on the road. Reduce your downtime and cost with genuine Spicer OE products.

node.long_desc: Rugged Ridge's Exo-Top JK Wrangler Soft Top combines the joy of top-down driving with the utility of a roof rack;Unlike with other Jeep soft tops with the Exo-Top you have the ability of conveniently lowering, raising or removing the soft top with ease without having to unload gear from the roof-rack cargo;The Exo-Top soft top for Jeep Wrangler JK features an innovative Sun Slider retractable function which allows the top to slide back with the release of just two latches;Integrated into the 300-lb. capacity roof rack is an advanced externally suspended soft-top design;Fastens using a series of Velcro straps along the perimeter bars of the roof rack;Direct bolt-on application with no drilling required for installation;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Exo-Top is an innovative new design that for the first time ever combines the joy of top-down driving with the utility of a roof rack, taking convenience, function, and style to new levels by allowing Jeep owners the ability of conveniently lowering, raising or removing the soft top with ease without having to unload gear from the roof-rack cargo. By combining the soft top and roof rack, owners can experience a Jeep to its full potential for camping, off-roading, or any lifestyle hobby they may have. This new top also features an innovative Sun Slider retractable function which allows the top to slide back with the release of just two latches, creating an open-top experience for owners without the hassle of getting out of the driver seat. Integrated into the 300-lb. capacity roof rack is an advanced externally suspended soft-top design that fastens using a series of Velcro straps along the perimeter bars of the roof rack. The pulling force applied by the Velcro helps to tighten and shape the soft top. Offered for both the two and four-door configurations, the Exo-Top features a patented design that is a direct bolt-on application with no drilling required for installation. Hard top owners will need the following factory soft top parts for installation. Windshield Header - 68003646AA, Tailgate Bar - 55395757AC, Tailgate Bar Retainer RH - 55395760AB and LH - 55395761AB.

node.long_desc: 3.6L 6 cylinder engine;Use on JKs with 2.5 inch or more liftHelps move the Y-pipe further back and increases the amount of front suspension travel from 2.5 to over 5.5;Saves your driveshaft'Spacers install on the flanges between the front headers and Y-pipe;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Jeep moved the exhaust forward on the 2012 Wrangler. Unfortunately, on Jeeps with 2.5 or more of lift that means their front driveshaft is liable to make contact with the exhaust Y-Pipe melting the CV boot and causing the driveshaft to fail prematurely. The Rugged Ridge Exhaust Spacer Kit for 3.6L Wrangler helps move the Y-pipe further back and increases the amount of front suspension travel from 2.5 to over 5.5, thus saving your driveshaft. The spacers install on the flanges between the front headers and Y-pipe. The great thing is the kit is easy to install and does not require permanent modification to the exhaust. Hardware included. Backed by Rugged Ridge's exclusive three-year limited warranty.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Fog Light Wire Harness
node.long_desc: Installation harness for three HID lights;Includes pre-terminated wiring harness and illuminated dash switch;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Pre-terminated wiring harness, relay and illuminated dash switch.

node.long_desc: 6 inch Round;With Rugged Ridge Logo;Black;Impact resistant stone guard;Crystal glass lenses mounted in weatherproof shock resistant rubber gasket;Multi-directional mounting base;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Designed, engineered, and tested to stand up to the rigors of off road use. Our lights are constructed with heavy-duty stamped steel housings, and crystal glass lenses set in shock absorbent weatherproof rubber gaskets. The multi-directional mounting base allows you to focus light where you need it the most. The brilliant 12V 100 watt halogen bulbs slice through fog, rain or snow to help illuminate the road even under the toughest conditions. Available in Round, Rectangular and Slim housings in either a black or stainless steel finish to best suit your application. Slim lights feature a narrow profile just 2-13/16? thick! This sleek design allows them to be mounted in places most lights won?t fit. They are perfect for windshield and grille mount light systems. The lights are available individually or in kits containing pre-terminated wiring harness, relay, impact resistant stone guards and illuminated dash switch.

node.long_desc: Black and Stainless;Weather resistant;Pair;Kit includes 1 short, 1 long footman loop, and hardware;Limited 5 Year Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This polished stainless steel short footman loop from Rugged is constructed of prime 304 stainless steel that has been polished to a mirror finish. 304 stainless steel is virtually rust proof guaranteeing that these parts will stand the test of time. Rugged Ridge offers the most complete line of stainless accessories so you can truly customize the look of your vehicle. When you want the best, look to Rugged Ridge Stainless Accessories!

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Fold and Tumble Rear Seats
node.long_desc: Black vinyl;Seat frame and brackets bolt to floor with minimal drilling;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Need more rear storage space in the back of your Jeep? Simply ?fold and tumble? the Rugged Ridge Rear Fold and Tumble Seat and you create instant cargo space. Each seat is constructed of durable automotive grade vinyl that is designed to match your vehicles interior and all Rugged Ridge front seats. Each frame is powdercoat painted and welded to make sure it can take those off road adventures. The foam pack used on all Rugged Ridge Seats is extremely dense for long life yet soft enough for true comfort. Installation is easy with attachments to existing mounting points and minimal drilling required.

node.long_desc: Black;For 1.5 inch diameter flashlights;Universal application;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Flash light mounting systems keep your emergency lighting handy. The universal mounting brackets design mounts to any flat surface with durable screws.

node.long_desc: Bulb for 7 inch HID lights;12V 35W 4200K HID Bulb;The average life of an HID bulb is 2000 hours, compared to 500-1200 hours for a halogen unit;Sold individually;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: HID lights are 2-1/2 times more powerful than halogen lights and draw 60% less current than a standard 100W fog light. Studies have demonstrated drivers react faster and more accurately to obstacles with HID lighting rather than halogen ones

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Sport Bar Fire Extinguisher Holders
node.long_desc: Black;Incorporates thick nylon web straps that secures your fire extinguisher to the roll bar;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Special designed holder incorporates thick nylon web straps that secures your Fire Extinguisher to the roll bar. Straps are fully adjustable and secure with hook and loop fasteners and will hold up to a 4 diameter fire extinguisher. Fits up to a 3 roll bar with or without padding.

node.long_desc: Fits Rugged Ridge XHD bumper;Bolts onto XHD modular bumpers in place of the d-rings;Black textured powder coated;Includes all necessary hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This pair of D-shackle brackets bolts onto XHD modular bumpers and allows you to attach D-shackles to the bumper base. Hardware included. D-shackles sold separately (Part # 11235.01)

node.long_desc: For 3 inch or more of Lift; With or Without power steering;Prevents steering bind caused by out of angle steering arms;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This drop pitman arm helps reduce the angle of your drag link and reduce bumpsteer created when a suspension lift is installed.

node.long_desc: 5 inch round stone guards;Black;Impact resistant;Sold individually;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Impact resistant stone guards.

node.long_desc: Polished 304 stainless or Aluminum; 2 or 4 Door; Entry guards;Sold as a pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Protect your door threshold with these stylish entry guards. They enhance the look of your Jeep while providing the ultimate in protection. Attaches with durable double sided tape. Sold as a pair.

node.long_desc: Reinforced mesh construction with built-in elastic straps;Installs between the front portion of a JK sport bar and windshield to protect either front or rear passengers separately;Eliminates the need for a header channel;Keep the shade in place and preserve function of the factory top;Installs with sewn-in bungee cords;Includes a small mesh carrying bag for storage when not in use;Available in your choice of tough black or hot red;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Looking for a summer top that is easy to install and remove? The Rugged Ridge Eclipse Sunshade gives the open air and top down feeling you want, while providing added protection from harsh sunlight. Featuring reinforced mesh construction, the half sun shade installs between the front portion of a JK sport bar and windshield to protect either front or rear passengers separately. The full-length sun shade is secured between the windshield and the rear crossbar of the JK sport bar to protect both front and rear passengers simultaneously. By using the mesh material with built-in elastic straps, this sunshade was designed from the start to eliminate the need for a header channel as with other similar products. An all-in-one package, this sunshade is simple to install and does not require any modifications. By retaining access to the Jeep top clamps, drivers can keep the shade in place and preserve function of the factory top. The Eclipse Sun Shade installs with sewn-in bungee cords and a small mesh carrying bag for storage when not in use. Compact in size, the Rugged Ridge sun shade can be stored in just about any compartment of your Jeep for quick access. Available in your choice of tough black or hot red.

node.sales_desc: This pair of UV treated chrome plastic door mirrors from Rugged Ridge has dual focal glass. All replacement mirrors are replicas of the factory original so you maintain that OE look while replacing those worn mirrors. Also available with LED turn indicator.

node.long_desc: Used to control dual battery setups;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: This high quality Rugged Ridge header is extra tough for extreme usage. Flanges are welded 360 degrees to stand up against the hottest conditions.
