node.long_desc: Reinforced elastic side straps with under body hooks;The soft top and hardware must be completely removed for proper fit;California Residents: WARNING"
Limiting Straps;Red;Sold in Pairs;5 Lengths Available;California Residents: WARNING"

This exclusive axle design from Trail Gear is the first in the industry to be released useing all new parts. Trail Gear's knuckle balls are forged from 1035 steel, making them much stronger than stock knuckle ever was, eliminating closed or bent knuckle balls. The axle tubes have been offset above the housing centerline, so the inner axles ride near the bottom of the axle tubes rather than in the center. The result is an increase of 3/8in. in ground clearance under the axle tubes. The axle tubes are made from 5/16in. thick 1020 DOM steel tubing with an outer diameter of 3in.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This exclusive axle design from Trail Gear is the first in the industry to be released useing all new parts. Trail Gear's knuckle balls are forged from 1035 steel, making them much stronger than stock knuckle ever was, eliminating closed or bent knuckle balls. The axle tubes have been offset above the housing centerline, so the inner axles ride near the bottom of the axle tubes rather than in the center. The result is an increase of 3/8in. in ground clearance under the axle tubes. The axle tubes are made from 5/16in. thick 1020 DOM steel tubing with an outer diameter of 3in.

node.long_desc: Trail-Gear introduces a new concept to the axle housing design. This exclusive design features axle tubes that have been offset above the housing centerline making the inner axle shafts ride near the bottom of the axle tubes rather than in the center. This repositioning of the axle tube results are an increase of 3/8in. ground clearance under the axle tubing. Trail Gear uses axle tubes made from 5/16 inch thick, high strength DOM steel tubing and engage 5/8in. farther into the center section. On top of that, there is a 360 gusset welded around the tubes on the inside of the housing to ensure unparalleled strength. The heavy-duty, press formed, 1/4in. plate steel center section shell is specially shaped to ensure a minimum of 3/4in. additional clearance under the differential. The differential mounting surface is made from inch plate steel to ensure studs can not pull out, even under heavy loads. The outer offset flanges are made from 4130 Chromoly to prevent distortion or bending. Housings are precision aligned using start-of-the-art, 3D digital imaging equipment.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Trail-Gear introduces a new concept to the axle housing design. This exclusive design features axle tubes that have been offset above the housing centerline making the inner axle shafts ride near the bottom of the axle tubes rather than in the center. Trail Gear uses axle tubes made from 5/16 inch thick, high strength DOM steel tubing and engage 5/8in. farther into the center section. On top of that, there is a 360 gusset welded around the tubes on the inside of the housing to ensure unparalleled strength. The heavy-duty, press formed, 1/4in. plate steel center section shell is specially shaped to ensure a minimum of 3/4in. additional clearance under the differential. The differential mounting surface is made from inch plate steel to ensure studs can not pull out, even under heavy loads. The outer offset flanges are made from 4130 Chromoly to prevent distortion or bending. Housings are precision aligned using start-of-the-art, 3D digital imaging equipment.

node.long_desc: The VSS gas shock uses a twin-tube shock design;Triple-chromed rod to ensure extended troublefree operation. ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The TeraFlex 9550 VSS is an exceptional shock absorber designed and developed specifically for a lifted Jeep Wrangler. This means you get the best extreme off-road performance and unequaled highway ride because it is engineered, valved, and tuned specifically for your Jeep. TeraFlex 9550 VSS shocks feature a proprietary in-house velocity valving that is tuned to react perfectly with TeraFlex suspension systems. A triple-chromed rod ensures trouble-free operation, and an oil block and seal wipe the shock rod during compression to keep all internal fluids sealed and contained for extended lifetime performance, additionally, an internal travel stop limiter minimizes the impact of over-compression. The 9550 VSS gas shock uses a heavy duty twin-tube design construction to provide protection from trail damage, and the durable black e-dipped finish resists salt and other corrosives under the most extreme conditions. Double-welded shock eyelets reinforce and support the shock body against repeated stress from constant suspension cycling. Premium-quality rubber bushings help to refine ride quality, Jeep specific mounting ends are vulcanized to the bushing to provide a hassle free installation. All TeraFlex 9550 VSS shocks are coverd by a limited lifetime warranty.

node.sales_desc: We believe in the value of durable, quality, long lasting off road products. We are living in a world where the term throw away" has become standard vocabulary for many of the products we purchase. Unfortunately many companies have blindly adopted this term into the designing and manufacturing of their low cost products. This mentality has forced much manufacturing to flee our country and into the hands of inexpensive foreign labor. Enter Hyline Offroad... We design and manufacture our products 100% in the USA under our roof."

node.long_desc: Full size front bumper is 60 inch;Fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 inch Steel Plate, laser cut, CNC formed, robotically welded, and hand finished by craftsmen.;D-Ring mounts are 5/8 inch Thick Plate;This bumper is completely Bolt-on, No Drilling Required.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Measuring in at 60 inch our full size front bumper is built for style and strength. Our unique original design allows you to install your winch after mounting the bumper to the vehicle. All of our front bumpers come standard with 1/4 inch-20 threaded inserts for mounting your license plate.

This heavy duty bumper is fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 inch Steel Plate, laser cut, CNC formed, robotically welded, and hand finished by craftsmen.

The D-Ring mounts are 5/8 inch Thick Plate and welded solid front and back so they can be used as recovery points. All bumpers receive a thorough zinc phosphate rinse and cleaning, E-Coated and then Powder Coated with a Lightly Textured Black finish.

This bumper is completely Bolt-on, No Drilling Required.

node.long_desc: Rear Bumper with 2 hitch receiver built in;Fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 inch Steel Plate;The D-Ring mounts are 5/8 inch Thick Steel Plate;Our rear bumper includes a gusseted 2 inch hitch receiver;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Our Standard Rear Bumper is a perfect compliment to our Front Bumper system. Our bumper doesn't just look great; it's functional, easy to install and tough as nails.

It's fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 inch Steel Plate, laser cut, CNC formed, robotically welded, and hand finished by craftsmen. The D-Ring mounts are 5/8 inch Thick Steel Plate and welded solid front and back so they can be used as recovery points.

Our rear bumper includes a gusseted 2 inch hitch receiver that is fully welded front and back for strength. We also include two frame tie-in brackets for added strength during recovery or pulling on the bumper (Frame tie-in brackets only fit 97-06 Models).

All bumpers receive a thorough zinc phosphate rinse and cleaning, E-Coated and then Powder Coated with a Lightly Textured Black finish.

node.long_desc: Universal builder part;Designed to fit in front or rear upper control arm mounts;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Rubicon Express Super-Flex cartridge was originally designed to replace the heim joints used in our early suspension designs. The large size joint is designed to fit directly into the factory front or rear lower control arm mounting points on the XJ/MJ/ZJ/TJ/WJ chassis. This cartridge uses UHMW side races and a unique threaded adjuster nut which allows easy tightening and rebuilding if necessary. Rubicon Express ran their JeepSpeed race Cherokee for a complete season on one set of control arms with Super-Flex Joints, without a single failure. After removal at the end of the season, they felt as tight as the day they were installed. In contrast, factory rubber bushings need to be replaced EVERY RACE!

node.long_desc: This kit features an extra thick threaded insert for adjustment and rebuilding. UHMW-PE races for superior impact resistance and anti-friction properties with a precision machined end right that eliminates the use of the snap-ring and washer found in the RE3791 and RE3792 Super Flex assemblies. Features 32 degrees of mis-alignment.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Rubicon Express Spring Over Conversion System w/Shocks
node.long_desc: The Rubicon Express spring-over axle conversion suspension system is designed for the truly adventurous off-roader, and is a fabricator's delight. This suspension system moves the leaf spring perches to the topside of the axle. The result is a net lift height increase of 5.5 inch with stock height springs. The use of stock spec springs will maintain the factory ride quality while the spring-over configuration will greatly increase the suspension flexibility, allowing room for larger tires and vastly improving the visual appeal of your Jeep. The Rubicon spring-over conversion kit gives you the components necessary to move the leaf spring perch to the top of the axle, increasing lift and flexibility. Spring-over axle lifts retain a stock-type ride quality by retaining the original leaf spring. Installation of this kit encompasses removing the original spring perches, welding of new perches, and other adjustments. A CV-type drive shaft is recommended for this application. Net lift from the conversion is minimum 5.5-inches. For greater durability, and a total of 7-inches of lift, we recommend running RE1445 and RE1444 Extreme-Duty leaf Springs. Note: Steering modifications are needed on a spring over conversion.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Rubicon Express spring-over axle conversion suspension system is designed for the truly adventurous off-roader, and is a fabricator's delight. This suspension system moves the leaf spring perches to the topside of the axle. The result is a net lift height increase of 5.5 inch with stock height springs. The use of stock spec springs will maintain the factory ride quality while the spring-over configuration will greatly increase the suspension flexibility, allowing room for larger tires and vastly improving the visual appeal of your Jeep. The Rubicon spring-over conversion kit gives you the components necessary to move the leaf spring perch to the top of the axle, increasing lift and flexibility. Spring-over axle lifts retain a stock-type ride quality by retaining the original leaf spring. Installation of this kit encompasses removing the original spring perches, welding of new perches, and other adjustments. A CV-type drive shaft is recommended for this application. Net lift from the conversion is minimum 5.5-inches. For greater durability, and a total of 7-inches of lift, we recommend running RE1445 and RE1444 Extreme-Duty leaf Springs. Note: Steering modifications are needed on a spring over conversion.

node.display_name: Rubicon Express Spring-Over Axle Lift Conversion Systems
node.long_desc: Spring Over Conversion Kits Includes:;Heavy-Duty Spring Perches Front and Rear; Heavy-Duty Spring Plates Front and Rear; Stainless Steel Brake Lines; Pitman Arm; Rubicon Express Advantage Lifetime Warranty;Extreme-Duty Spring Under Kits Include:;2.5 Inch Wide Extreme-Duty Front and Rear Leaf Springs; Greaseable Shackles; Greaseable Main Eye Bushings; Stainless Steel Brake Lines; Heavy-Duty U-Bolt Skid Plates; Durability, Flexibility and Ride Quality;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Rubicon Express spring-over axle conversion suspension system is designed for the truly adventurous off-roader and is a fabricators delight. This suspension system moves the leaf spring perches to the topside of the axle. The result is a net lift height increase of 5.5 inches with stock height springs. The use of stock spec springs will maintain the factory ride quality while the spring-over configuration will greatly increase the suspension flexibility, allow room for larger tires and vastly improve the visual appeal of your Jeep. The spring-over conversion requires welding new perches to the top of the axle. Steering modifications are required and a CV-driveshaft is mandatory. If you desire even more lift, the addition of a set of Rubicon Express Extreme-Duty leaf springs (RE1444 and RE1445) result in a total lift height of 7 inches. The spring-over axle suspension configuration will allow the use of 33 inch tires when using stock leaf springs. The fitment of even larger tires is possible with additional modifications.Steering modifications will be needed

node.sales_desc: Bolt on shock mount relocaters install into factory rear shock mount locations to restore proper shock positioning. Moving the shock away from spring pads and the axle tube allows for axle rotation on lifted Jeeps.

node.display_name: Rubicon Express Slip Yoke Eliminator Kits
node.long_desc: Stock Jeeps have a slip yoke style output shaft at the rear driveline. This design is not conducive to off road use nor the steeper operating angles caused by suspension lifts. To ensure smooth and durable driveline operation, convert to a fixed yoke output and install a CV drive shaft (style RE1898). A must on all lifts over 3.5 inch. This kit requires the modification of your stock output shaft. Drill and tap included for easy installation. Drive flange is machined from solid Stainless Steel for extreme strength and corrosion resistance.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Stock Jeeps have a slip yoke style output shaft at the rear driveline. This design is not conducive to off road use nor the steeper operating angles caused by suspension lifts. To ensure smooth and durable driveline operation, convert to a fixed yoke output and install a CV drive shaft (style RE1898). A must on all lifts over 3.5 inch. This kit requires the modification of your stock output shaft. Drill and tap included for easy installation. Drive flange is machined from solid Stainless Steel for extreme strength and corrosion resistance.

node.display_name: Rubicon Express Twin-Tube Shock Absorber Kits
node.long_desc: Developed and tuned specifically for each application;Provides all the great handling characteristics as our monotube shocks in a more affordable package;These shocks are recommended for installations when risk of denting or other impact is probable;Oversized shock bodies with 1.625 inch diameter pistons for maximum control and 11/16 inch chrome shafts for maximum strength;Shock Absorber Kit includes four shocks;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rubicon Express twin-tube shocks will help your Jeep reach its full potential--without emptying your wallet! Rubicon packs these oversized shock bodies with 1.625 in. diameter pistons for maximum control and 11/16 in. chrome shafts for maximum strength. They also include rebound stops, multi-lip seals, black urethane bushings, and double-welded rings for durability, making them anything but your typical economy shocks! Plus, since they're not budget-busters, how perfect would they be for the bumps, ruts, rock, and debris of off-roading, where the risk of denting and impact is unavoidable? Twin-tubes are tuned application-specific, so you will have no worries about ride quality when they're paired with your new suspension system. Don't put generic shocks on your Jeep to save money. Choose ones built with your Jeep and your wallet in mind--Rubicon Express twin-tube shocks.
